Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Archer
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/Lake
ShortDescription: NB 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Washington & Michigan, due to street blockage near State/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Washington and Michigan, due to street blockage near State/Lake.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/Lake
ShortDescription: NB 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Madison, Dearborn, Wacker & State, due to street blockage near State/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Madison, Dearborn, Wacker, then resume their normal route at State, due to street blockage near State/Lake.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Board/Exit  Changes for Yellow Line trains on the 95th -and Loop-bound platform at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Board/Exit  Changes for Yellow Line trains on the 95th -and Loop-bound platform at Howard. 

Yellow Line trains are departing from this platform to help prevent congestion at Howard
